name: Chad Runner
description:
Running through the doors, getting cooler till you're crowned prom king or till you get the girl; whichever comes first!

Make the right choices and turn from NOT to HOT! Explore the story of a lame nerd with a destiny to become the best Chad the school has ever seen. It's a wild run, can you keep up? The right choices will have all the girls going wild for your moves. But beware, one wrong decision will leave you all alone with no hot girls ready to follow you and no chance at prom king.

Learn the ways of the Chad and pickup all the right moves (and girls) till you reach the destiny you desire!


Chad Runner Features:
- Multiple reward scenarios for each level
- Help Chad look his best by picking up the coolest accessories
- Pickup the hottest swag to increase your coolness score
- Beat the other guys to become the ultimate Chad
